sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Load chart colors for catalog task state from the com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform plugin only if the instance doesn't has custom chart color records already defined for the catalog task states or if they have OOTB chart colors override it.</description>
        <name>Chart color for catalog task state v2</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var ootbColors = "91d65878c7033010d7e818b1c7c26014,98a51838c7033010d7e818b1c7c260a6,eea61878c7033010d7e818b1c7c260e7,ee171878c7033010d7e818b1c7c260f8,86679878c7033010d7e818b1c7c260fb,8bb79c78c7033010d7e818b1c7c260cb";
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_report_chart_color");
    gr.addQuery("name", "sc_task");
    gr.addQuery("element", "state");
	gr.addQuery("sys_id","NOT IN", ootbColors);
	gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();
    if (!gr.hasNext()) {
        gs.log("Loading sys_report_chart_color for sc_task.state", "[com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform][Fix Script: Load chart color for catalog task state]");
        GlideUpdateManager2().load("com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform", "update.sc_task_chart_colors");
    }
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-05 13:10:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5a95c10843793110b8cf8beeaab8f2f6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Chart color for catalog task state v2</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">3607b4283cb1311068bcf327dfe37fee</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5a95c10843793110b8cf8beeaab8f2f6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-05 15:47:09</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Chart color for catalog task state v2
